recipe.title: Banana, Coffee, Cashew, and Cocoa Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup raw cashews, preferably soaked overnight
3 tablespoons old-fashioned oats, preferably soaked overnight
instructions: Using smoothie or ice crush setting, purée banana, dates, coffee, cashews, oats, cocoa powder, cardamom, salt, and 1/2 cup ice in a blender until smooth.
